thread.title: Karl Lagerfeld Explains Designing Chanel’s Space-Inspired FW17 Show
thread.title_full: Karl Lagerfeld Explains Designing Chanel’s Space-Inspired FW17 Show

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Karl Lagerfeld Explains Designing Chanel’s Space-Inspired FW17 Show
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
Year after year, show after show, Karl Lagerfeld continues to outdo himself in terms wowing audiences with his over-the-top productions. For FW17, it was no different, but where would the renowned designer take us to next? In short, space. 
Lagerfeld spent roughly six months creating the otherworldly set to take us to the final frontier , all in means of showcasing Chanel’s new seasonal delivery. The show was even highlighted by a rocket that launched during the finale, appropriately soundtracked by Elton John’s “Rocket Man.” 
To hear Lagerfeld explain designing Chanel’s space-inspired FW17 show, press play above.
